snippet: Of those who applied and were found eligible for the Medicaid or CHIP, slightly more than half were in states that have decided to expand Medicaid, as permitted under the Affordable Care Act, while 48 percent were in states that have not expanded...
abstract: Of those who applied and were found eligible for the Medicaid or CHIP, slightly more than half were in states that have decided to expand Medicaid, as permitted under the Affordable Care Act, while 48 percent were in states that have not expanded Medicaid.

headline.main: October Medicaid Applications Far Outpace Enrollment Through Exchanges
